actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to modify the project at Royal River, Yarmouth, Maine, and relating to the Federal share of the maintenance costs of the project.

summary.text: Modifies the Royal River, Yarmouth, Maine, navigation project to provide for Federal payment of all the dredging costs, necessary to maintain such project, including the cost of providing a disposal site for the dredged material.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project at Royal River, Yarmouth, Maine, and relating to the Federal share of the maintenance costs of the project.
